name: Lobbying Africa Limited
headAddress: 2nd Floor College House, 17 King Edwards Road
goal:
Our company have the mission to be an active player on the Development of Africa by bringing businessmen, entrepreneurs and investors to the country that can truly increase the economy activity.

We focus our work on helping our customers to have a better chance on business opportunities in several African Countries.

With our work we want to contribute to help the African people explore the potential of their countries and have better life expectations of their futures.
interests: Borders and Security, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Foreign Relations with African Countries; EU on African Countries; Refugees and Emigration
